appearance.title: APPEARANCE
appearance.description: Customize your experience by choosing the display mode and configuring additional options that suit your style.

advanced.title: Advanced Customization
advanced.description: Explore additional options to configure your interface, such as accent color selection and font settings to improve readability.

preview.title: Theme Preview
preview.description: This is a preview of the selected theme. Change the customization options and observe how your application environment transforms.

profiles.title: Social Profiles
profiles.description: Connect your social profiles to share content and enhance your experience.

connected_accounts.title: Connected Accounts
connected_accounts.description: Connect your accounts for easier login.

settings.title: Privacy Settings
settings.description: Control who can see your information and how it's used.

sessions.title: Active Sessions
sessions.description: Manage your active sessions and log out from remote devices.

security.title: SECURITY
security.description: Add an extra layer of security to your account.

2fa.title: Two-Factor Authentication (2FA)
2fa.description: Two-Factor Authentication adds an extra layer of security to your account. By requiring a second form of verification, it helps prevent unauthorized access, even if someone knows your password.
2fa.description2: Once enabled, you'll be asked for a verification code sent to your device each time you log in. You can use an authenticator app to complete this process.

qr_code.title: Scan this QR Code
qr_code.description: Use your authenticator app to scan the code and enable 2FA

disable_warning.title: WARNING: Disable 2FA
disable_warning.description1: Disabling Two-Factor Authentication will significantly reduce the security of your account. Without 2FA, your account will be more vulnerable to unauthorized access.
disable_warning.description2: We strongly recommend keeping 2FA enabled to protect your personal information and data.

login_history.title: Login History
login_history.description: Review your login history to detect suspicious activities. If you observe logins you don't recognize, change your password immediately and enable two-factor authentication.

errors.general: An error occurred while updating your information.
